channel.title: FrozenAge - The return
channel.description:
[ul][CENTER] [IMG]http://frozenage.org/logo_5.png[/img]
FrozenAge returns with a mind blowing back story to it, looking to climb it's way back up to a reputable server. I've decided to come clean about a few things, and bring the server back from the dead around August of 2013, with this will bring an all new server to the FrozenAge name.
We weren't the top server, but we did have a fair player base, with a great community behind it.
Without further ado; we're now announcing the return of FrozenAge.
To start things off, I'd like to give some thanks: 2008 - 2011 FrozenAge community [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/mike/"]Mike (of DeltaScape)[/URL] Kyle (of DeltaScape)
FrozenAge will return developed on the [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/163324-hyperion.html"]Hyperion[/URL] framework developed by [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/graham/"]Graham[/URL]
Some credits for the current progression of the server go to:
[B][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/graham/"]Graham[/URL] for [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/163324-hyperion.html"]his open-source gameserver suite, Hyperion[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/bando/"]bando[/URL] for [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/412014-advanced-hyperion-release.html"]his modified version of Hyperion[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/eliminate/"]Eliminate[/URL] for [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/495821-eliminates-v0-4-client-release-clean-client-no-anti-leeches.html"]his client which is being used for testing, and has been a huge help.[/URL][/B]
[U][B]To be noted:[/B][/U] I'm going to try to document everything that we do with progress reports as much as possible. Organization is a key factor, however, may not be put into play at all times when displaying progress / media. [/CENTER]
[hr]
[CENTER][SIZE=4][COLOR=DeepSkyBlue]Current Progress / Features[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR=#007c00]Finished[/COLOR] | [COLOR=#bbbd09]In Progress[/COLOR] | [COLOR=maroon]Not Started[/COLOR] [/CENTER]

player[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#007c00]Player verse NPC[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#007c00]Poisoning[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#007c00]Prayer modifiers / protection[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#bbbd09]Melee combat[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#bbbd09]Ranged combat[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#bbbd09]Magic combat[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#007c00]Equipment requirements[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=#007c00]Equipment [CENTER][SIZE=4][COLOR=#4f7587]Latest Updates[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][/ul] [code] * 12/16/2013 ** Started Farming skill ** Finished Warriors Guild animating armours
* 12/10/2013 ** Started Warriors Guild minigame *** Animating armours started
* 12/12/2013 ** Finished Turael Slayer tasks ** Finished Vannaka Slayer tasks
* 12/17/2013 ** Rewrote crafting armour ** Fixed object spawning (for thieving)
* 12/18/2013 ** Finished skill requirement menus ** Finished adding all map clue scrolls ** Started door management *** Finished door loading *** Finished single / double door opening ** Started Farming
* 12/22/2013 ** Finished weaving items (loom) [/code]

item.title: FrozenAge - The return
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:14, topic:536718”][quote author=FrozenAge link=topic=655532.msg4388682#msg4388682 date=1386672373]
That’s great to hear, from both of you; Sini and Wanderer, and I do remember both of you, good to see you two again. Thanks for the support! Also, Wanderer, of course I remember you, we were talking not too long ago, I believe it was around the time I just started to pick the project up.
[/quote]

Just get this going, I have a plan to beat The Wanderer at Slayer.[/quote]

Oh, it’s been on with, I’ll devote more time to Slayer, just for you two.

Read full topic

@sinisoul wrote:

FrozenAge:

That’s great to hear, from both of you; Sini and Wanderer, and I do remember both of you, good to see you two again. Thanks for the support! Also, Wanderer, of course I remember you, we were talking not too long ago, I believe it was around the time I just started to pick the project up.

Just get this going, I have a plan to beat The Wanderer at Slayer.

item.title: FrozenAge - The return
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

This is where it all started for me too. And where me and sini met. I’m not sure if you remember me mike, but glad this is coming back. I had the same name and was pmod then promoted to admin if that jogs the memory any. Best of luck and I probably will play for memories sake.

Read full topic

item.title: FrozenAge - The return
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

This is the RSPS that got me into programming. I missed this server so much, it had a great community. Good luck guys. I don’t give my support much to projects but I really would love to once again play this.

item.title: FrozenAge - The return
item.dc:creator: @FrozenAge FrozenAge
item.description:
@FrozenAge wrote:

[ul][CENTER]

FrozenAge returns with a mind blowing back story to it, looking to climb it’s way back up to a reputable server.
I’ve decided to come clean about a few things, and bring the server back from the dead around August of 2013, with this will bring an all new server to the FrozenAge name.

We weren’t the top server, but we did have a fair player base, with a great community behind it.

Without further ado; we’re now announcing the return of FrozenAge.

To start things off, I’d like to give some thanks:
2008 - 2011 FrozenAge community
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/mike/”]Mike (of DeltaScape)[/URL]
Kyle (of DeltaScape)

FrozenAge will return developed on the [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/163324-hyperion.html”]Hyperion[/URL] framework developed by [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/graham/”]Graham[/URL]

Some credits for the current progression of the server go to:

[B][URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/graham/”]Graham[/URL] for [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/163324-hyperion.html”]his open-source gameserver suite, Hyperion[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/bando/”]bando[/URL] for [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/412014-advanced-hyperion-release.html”]his modified version of Hyperion[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/members/eliminate/”]Eliminate[/URL] for [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/495821-eliminates-v0-4-client-release-clean-client-no-anti-leeches.html”]his client which is being used for testing, and has been a huge help.[/URL][/B]

[U][B]To be noted:[/B][/U]
I’m going to try to document everything that we do with progress reports as much as possible.
Organization is a key factor, however, may not be put into play at all times when displaying progress / media.
[/CENTER]
